ValidationRule.description: Verifies record does not have a Qtrly, Semi or Annual pay freq
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Enhanced_Package__c , Entrepreneur_Package__c , Essentials_Package__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Frequency__c , '4'), ISPICKVAL( Frequency__c , '2'), ISPICKVAL( Frequency__c , '1') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** YOU MAY NOT SELL THIS PACKAGE FOR QTRLY, SEMI OR ANNUAL FREQ ***
